# Four Billion years of evolution in six minutes

If we are evolve from monkeys, why there're still monkeys?

Will, because we are not monkeys, we are fish.<br />![image.png](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2020/png/691897/1585842521425-ad2109b7-149c-4044-b87c-775ac8d30f83.png#align=left&display=inline&height=163&name=image.png&originHeight=163&originWidth=285&size=30470&status=done&style=none&width=285)

Now, knowying you are a fish, and not a monkey is really important to understand about where we came from.

I teach one of the largest biological evolutionary class in the US.<br />My students finally understand why I calling them fish... then, I am getting my job done.

But I was always starting my classes by something hard, wild myth, because that was really knowing it, any of since talk evolution, wrong.

For instance, we are talking to say teh theory of evolution, there are many different theories, and just like the process itselfves, the one that best fit the data the one that survive today, the one we know best it Darwine's Natural Selection that was the processes that organisam that fit the environment to survive, get reproduce, will, that less fited, slowly die off. And that's it. Evolution is simple as that. (And it is the fact).

Evolution is the fact as much as the gravity. You can prove it just easily. Just as you look at your balibutton that you share with other placental mammals, your backbone that you share with other virtibrates, your DNA that you share with all other life on Earth.

Those trace doesn't pop up on humance. There are pastdown from different ancesters to all the decendence, not just us.<br />That's not how really we learn about biology early on easy.<br />We learn plants, bacteria and primative things,Â  ** **amphibients** to reptiles to mammals, then, you get you, this perfect evolved creature at the end of the line. The life doesn't evolve in a line and it doesn't evolve with us. But we all were showed evolution potrates like this. From monkeys to champinzee, some extincted humans, all of them forward starting murch becoming us. But they don't becoming anymore then we would becoming them. We also not the goal of the evolution.

Why does it matter? Why do we need to understand the evolution the right way? Well, misunderstand evolution has made many problems, but you can't ask that question, that ages of question that, where are we from without understanding evolution right way. Misunderstanding it as let to many convoluted and crooberate view of how we should tread other life on the earth and how we treat each other in terms of race and gender. So, let's go back, 4 billion years.

This is all the single organism we came from, we give arize of other single cell of life
